plot: An incident at Riverdale High leaves the town on edge; The reveal of a devastating secret leads to a violent showdown between Chic, Jughead, Betty and Alice.

The Black Hood's latest murder leaves the town on edge as residents lose confidence in Sheriff Keller. Hermione teams up with Cheryl to seal his fate. Betty and Jughead are determined to find out more about Chic and pay a visit to the Sisters of Quiet Mercy, where they make a shocking discovery. The Coopers are blind-sighted as the horrifying truth about Chic is revealed. Alice makes a heartbreaking discovery and tells FP the truth. Betty receives a call from the Black Hood with a dark request that she may just fulfill. Elsewhere, Nick St. Clair returns to town to get revenge on Archie. Hiram refuses to pay Archie's ransom, leading to Veronica being forced to take matters into her own hands and make a horrifying sacrifice for Archie's life. Finally, Archie is determined to catch the Black Hood and enlists Hiram's help, while Betty has a sinister realization following a dark choice.—snowflakeaudrey
